episodes.shortSummary: A young boy mysteriously disappears, and his panicked mother demands that the police find him.
While the search for the missing Will continues, Joyce tells Jim about a call she apparently received from her son.
While Nancy looks for a missing Barbara and realizes that Jonathan may have been the last person to see her, Mike and his friends go out with Jane to find the missing Will.
Jim realizes that the government is covering something up about Will's death and begins a personal investigation.
Jim searches for Will at Hawkins Laboratory, but finds something unexpected.
Jonathan manages to pull Nancy back to the real world from the Upside Down.
Jim manages to bring everyone together so that they can join forces to reconnect Jane to the Upside Down and find Will.
Jim convinces Brenner to let him and Joyce enter the Upside Down to find Will.
One year after the events with the Upside Down and the Demogorgon, Will meets with a government doctor.
The boys go trick-or-treating on Halloween, and Will has another vision.
Dustin takes in a stray and calls it D'Artagnan.
After his encounter with the shadow creature, Will's condition worsens.
Jim is trapped in the Upside Down, and Joyce enlists Bob to help find him.
Owens and his team try to find a way to end the shadow creature's influence on Will.
El travels to Chicago to find her sister Eight, aka Kali, who has teamed up with other outcasts to kill the men who tormented her at Hawkins Labs.
When the demo-dogs overrun Hawkins Labs, one of the group saves the others at the cost of their own life.
The group splits up to close the gate, evict the Mind Flayer from Will, and drive the demo-dogs away from Hawkins Lab.
Things change over the summer: Jonathan, Nancy, Steve, and Billy get jobs; Dustin goes to science camp; El and Mike become an item; Lucas and Max almost become an item.
While El and Max go shopping, Nancy and Wheeler follow up on the exploding rats.

episodes.shortTitle: The Case of the Missing Lifeguard
episodes.shortSummary: El goes astrally projecting and discovers that Billy has done something with Heather.
Mike, Lucas, and Will recruit El and Max to help them learn who the Mind Flayer's host is.

The Scoop Group explore the tunnels beneath Starcourt, while Nancy and Jonathan recruit Mike and the others to help them discover what happen to the Holloways and find the Mind Flayer's base of operations.
Dr.
El and the others defend themselves as the Flayer tracks them down.
The Flayer comes to the mall to get El, and Dustin contacts Suzie to provide Jim and Joyce with needed information.
